name: My
description:
In the 1900s, a quiet village in the south of America lived in the desert. They spent calm nights until the mutations began in the region. All of a sudden, the cacti around them started to evolve and move whenever they wanted. In order to survive, they slaughtered many people in their sight. Nobody could resist their control over the village, except for one cowboy. 

Ruthless cowboy was willing to sacrifice everything for his family and people, even if it costs his life. He knew that the only way to find peace was through violence.
